overview: Paul Hurley Founded ideeli Inc. in 2006 and serves as its Chief Executive Officer. Mr. Hurley serves as Chief Executive Officer of Aveo, Inc. He has founded a series of technology startups, including Aveo Inc. and Cypress Research Corporation. Previously, Mr. Hurley provided applications development consulting and interface design to high technology companies. He developed screen-based phone and unified messaging products for Siemens-Rolm call center systems and created … call capabilities for Apple’s Newton (Personal Digital Assistant). He serves as a Director of ImpactOnline, Inc. Mr. Hurley is a frequent speaker at industry forums, a Henry Crown Fellow at the Aspen Institute and holds a BA degree from Yale University.
